title: Burning bush

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Spells](#Spells)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Burning bushes** are stationary plants that are perpetually on [fire](/Fire "Fire"), spitting flames at any target that comes near. They can [see invisible](/See_invisible "See invisible") targets and aggressively defend their territory. Followers of [Fedhas](/Fedhas "Fedhas") can summon them with the Overgrow ability.

They occasionally appear as monsters in the [Dungeon Sprint](/Dungeon_Sprint "Dungeon Sprint") map "Fedhas' Mad Dash."

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                                 |                                                      |
| :---------- | ----------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Throw Flame](/Throw_Flame "Throw Flame") (3d7) | [Natural flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- By the time you see one, burning bushes are barely any threat at all. Deal with the more serious threats first.
- [Fire resistance](/Fire_resistance "Fire resistance") will reduce the damage they deal to you while a source of [Repel Missiles](/Repel_Missiles#Player_sources "Repel Missiles") will make it harder for them to hit you in the first place.

## History

- In [0.32](/0.32 "0.32"), burning bushes will be replaced with [scrub nettles](/Scrub_nettle "Scrub nettle").
- Prior to [0.19](/0.19 "0.19"), they could be found in a rare vault in [the Realm of Zot](/The_Realm_of_Zot "The Realm of Zot").
- Prior to [0.16](/0.16 "0.16"), burning bushes could be summoned as allies in [Zot Defense](/Zot_Defense "Zot Defense").

Burning bush

From CrawlWiki

Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
burning bush P 
HP 29-59
HD 8
XP 314
Speed 10 (stationary)
AC 10
EV 0
Will 40



Resistances rF+
rPois+
rDrown
rTorm
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence Brainless
Uses Uses nothing
Holiness Plant
Size Giant
Type plant, bush
Flags See invisible
Unbreathing
Stationary
A mass of blackened twigs wreathed in orange flames, with scorch marks scarring its surroundings.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Spells
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 History

Useful Info

Burning bushes are stationary plants that are perpetually on fire, spitting flames at any target that comes near. They can see invisible targets and aggressively defend their territory. Followers of Fedhas can summon them with the Overgrow ability.

They occasionally appear as monsters in the Dungeon Sprint map "Fedhas' Mad Dash."

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Throw Flame (3d7) Natural flag

Tips & Tricks

  • By the time you see one, burning bushes are barely any threat at all. Deal with the more serious threats first.
  • Fire resistance will reduce the damage they deal to you while a source of Repel Missiles will make it harder for them to hit you in the first place.

History

  • In 0.32, burning bushes will be replaced with scrub nettles.
  • Prior to 0.19, they could be found in a rare vault in the Realm of Zot.
  • Prior to 0.16, burning bushes could be summoned as allies in Zot Defense.
